prompt: Analyze the impact of educational leadership on teaching quality and school culture, highlighting effective leadership practices.

criteria.name: Understanding of Leadership Theories and Models
criteria.description: Demonstrates in-depth knowledge of educational leadership approaches.

performance_descriptors.excellent: Thoroughly explains multiple leadership models (transformational, distributed, instructional) with application examples.
performance_descriptors.good: Describes key leadership theories with some application.
performance_descriptors.average: Mentions leadership concepts at a superficial level.

criteria.name: Evaluation of Leadership Impact
criteria.description: Assesses how leadership influences teaching quality, staff development, and school climate.

performance_descriptors.excellent: Insightfully evaluates leadership impacts supported by case studies and research.

criteria.name: Use of Research and Organizational Examples
criteria.description: Integrates empirical studies and real-world data on leadership effectiveness.

performance_descriptors.excellent: Critically synthesizes multiple sources and organizational cases.

criteria.name: Practical Leadership Strategies
criteria.description: Proposes actionable strategies for effective leadership to enhance teaching and school culture.

criteria.name: Academic Writing and Structure
criteria.description: Evaluates clarity, coherence, and academic rigor of writing.

performance_descriptors.good: Clear and structured with minor errors.

key_points: Discuss multiple leadership theories and their impact on school settings.
Evaluate leadership's role in improving teacher performance and fostering positive culture.
Use research and case studies to support claims.
Detail leadership strategies including collaboration, vision-setting, and professional development.
Maintain formal, coherent academic tone throughout.
llm_questions: What leadership models are most effective in education?
How does leadership influence teaching and learning outcomes?
What research supports instructional leadership's impact?
How can leaders build a strong school culture?
What role does shared leadership play?
How should leaders support teacher growth?
What are challenges in educational leadership?
